page.title: 13The Day of Father Donovan
page.content:
Anthony Donovan is one of the two
riests in Our Lady of the Angels church.In the morning he gets up at 7.30a.m..For his breakfast he occasionally has Weetabix.Each morning he visits the hospital and takes communion with the sick.He talks and prays with them as well.For his lunch he has a snack.In the afternoon he visits the homes of the sick.He goes to bed at 12.30.For relaxation and entertainment he runs a youth club, watches football, listens to radio and he is in a discussion group.He enjoys his job and does not get bored with it.
